title: Tro-Bro Léon: Another Year, Another Bonkers Promotional Poster
content:
Valentin Madouas styled as a pirate, with a flying pig above – what's not to love? Tro-Bro Léon unveils its latest crazy artwork.

Read the full article at Tro-Bro Léon: Another Year, Another Bonkers Promotional Poster on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
